aeroplane: aeroplane: fixed wings, vertical tail fin, jet engines, cockpit windshield, aluminum fuselage
bicycle: bicycle: curved handlebars, spoked wheels, pedal crankset, chainring teeth, leather saddle
boat: boat: curved hull shape, mast with sails, outboard motor propeller, porthole windows, anchor chain
bottle: bottle: screw-top cap, cylindrical glass body, paper label, ridged neck, flat circular base
car: car: windshield wipers, side rearview mirrors, front grille, alloy wheels, door handle indents
cat: cat: pointed triangular ears, long whiskers, retractable claws, furry coat texture, slender tail
chair: chair: wooden backrest, four straight legs, padded armrests, woven seat cushion, slatted design
diningtable: diningtable: flat rectangular surface, thick central leg, table apron, place settings, polished wooden texture
dog: dog: floppy ears, wet nose texture, collar tag, paw pads, curly bushy tail
horse: horse: flowing mane, elongated facial structure, hoofed feet, muscular hind legs, thick tail
person: person: upright bipedal posture, five-fingered hands, facial features (eyes/nose/mouth), hair strands, clothing fabric
pottedplant: pottedplant: green broad leaves, terracotta pot, exposed soil surface, drainage holes, decorative pot patterns
sheep: sheep: thick woolly coat, short stubby tail, spiral curved horns, cloven hooves, blunt snout
train: train: locomotive front coupler, linked passenger cars, flanged railway wheels, smokestack, pantograph roof
tvmonitor: tvmonitor: rectangular glass screen, plastic bezel, adjustable stand, control buttons, rear input ports
bird: bird: pointed beak, layered feather wings, sharp talons, head crest/crown, fanned tail plumage
bus: bus: multiple row windows, flat vertical front, large rubber tires, destination signboard, elongated body
cow: cow: pendulous udder, upward-curving horns, wet broad nose, black-and-white spotted hide, switch tail
motorbike: motorbike: high handlebars, chrome exhaust pipes, kickstand, foot pegs, tandem vinyl seat
sofa: sofa: tufted cushions, rolled armrests, upholstered backrest, fabric/leather texture, wooden claw feet
